Title: Careers advice and guidance
Description: Information, advice and guidance on careers support for ages 13 to 30. Please visit the website below for full information.

Title: Find a job -GOV.UK
Description: Find full or part-time jobs in England, Scotland and Wales. Use the ‘Find a job’ service to search and apply for jobs. This service has replaced Universal Jobmatch. Find a job   Further information that may be useful: Find a job - GOV.UK (www.gov.uk) Become…

Title: greater jobs
Description: greater.jobs is a careers and recruitment website managed by a collaboration of public sector employers led by Wigan Council who are responsible for this greater.jobs Careers and Recruitment website.

Title: Greater Manchester Apprenticeship & Careers Service (GMACS)
Description: The Greater Manchester Apprenticeship & Careers Service (GMACS) helps young people explore and design their next steps before leaving school. The site brings together different stages of the career planning process, helping students navigate the choices open to them and develop the tools to start…

Title: Jobcentre Plus
Description: Jobcentre Plus is part of the Department for Work and Pensions. Jobcentre Plus provides advice and information on a range of employment and training issues for people of working age. Helping find the right kind of jobs: full time or part time, temporary or permanent. Provides…

Title: Learning, courses and training
Description: No matter your age, there are learning, courses and training options for everyone.  Visit the website below to find out what's on offer.

Title: National Careers Service
Description: The National Careers Service provides high quality, free and impartial careers advice, information and guidance. Our service is available to anyone aged 13+ no matter what stage of the careers journey you’re at. Please visit their website below for more information.

Title: Wigan Wellbeing & Resilience Services
Description: Wigan Wellbeing & Resilience has been commissioned by Wigan Council and under the umbrella of Creative Support to provide a borough wide tenancy and wellbeing support service for adults and young people with a wide range of support needs.  The support service is based in…
Location: Olympic House, Platt Street, Platt Bridge, Wigan, WN2 5DA

Title: Working Families
Description: We provide free legal advice to parents and carers on their rights at work. We give employers the tools they need to support their employees while creating a flexible, high-performing workforce. And we advocate on behalf of the UK’s 13 million working parents, influencing policy through campaigns informed by ground-breaking research.…
